ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is a well-known bug, being teleported into lava somewhere beneath a lava pool (therefore not being able to surface).  Why it hasn t been fixed is
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000, Bill Costlow wrote:

> Last night when my party zoned into Lavastorm from
> Najena our druid was teleported into a lava pool in
> the far North side of the zone.

This is a well-known bug, being teleported into lava somewhere beneath a
lava pool (therefore not being able to surface). Why it hasn't been fixed
is beyond me, it would certainly take a load off the guides' time.

Another bug to watch out for (obviously not for a while for some) occurs
in Kedge. While fighting, if something gets knocked into the ceiling or a
wall, it will often teleport back to it's spawn point. Twice now I've
been the victim of a teleporting Swirlspine Guardian, who subsequently
started summoning people directly into Phinigel's lair. Not a fun thing,
by any means.

Athren Notechaser, 50th composition in progress
Cazic-Thule <The Relentless>

P.s. Hello to Phreekitty, and an excellent job on your Kedge guide. I'm
about halfway through reading it. :) (gameznet.com/eq, aka EQlizer)
